Literature.Title: Litopeidin28-51, a novel antimicrobial peptide from Litopenaeus vannamei, combats white spot syndrome virus infection through direct virus lysis and immunomodulatory effects
Literature.Author: Meng XZ, Duan Y, Bai Y, Zhang W, Zhang C, Wang KJ, Chen F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii CGMCC 1.6769(MIC=6-12µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CGMCC 1.6769(MBC=12-24µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=3-6µM),Escherichia coli CGMCC 1.2389(MIC=6-12µM),Vibrio alginolyticus CGMCC 1.1833(MIC=6-12µM),Vibrio alginolyticus CGMCC 1.1833(MBC=12-24µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1593(MIC=6-12µM),Vibrio harveyi CGMCC 1.1593(MBC=12-24µM),Vibrio fluvialis CGMCC 1.1609(MIC=6-12µM),Vibrio fluvialis CGMCC 1.1609(MBC=6-12µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus CGMCC 1.1615(MIC=6-12µM),Vibrio parahaemolyticus CGMCC 1.1615(MBC=12-24µM),Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.2465(MIC=6-12µM),Staphylococcus aureus CGMCC 1.2465(MBC=12-24µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MIC=6-12µM),Cryptococcus neoformans CGMCC 2.1563(MFC=12-24µM),Fusarium oxysporum CGMCC 3.6785(MIC=6-12µM),Fusarium oxysporum CGMCC 3.6785(MFC=12-24µM),Fusarium solani CGMCC 3.584(MIC=6-12µM),Fusarium solani CGMCC 3.584(MFC=12-24µM),Fusarium graminearum CGMCC 3.4521(MIC=12-24µM),Fusarium graminearum CGMCC 3.4521(MFC=24-48µM),Aspergillus niger CGMCC 3.316(MIC=12-24µM),Aspergillus niger CGMCC 3.316(MFC=24-48µM),White spot syndrome virus (WSSV)(70-80% REP=10µM)
